lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: After watching a television program about Kiva on our local PBS station I decided to view Kiva's website. I think this is a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large Post Office where my duties vary throughout the day. My main focus is sorting of and computer maintainence for 3000 customers.

lender.name: Line
lender.occupation: Director, Interactive Services at Safe Kids
lender.loan_because:
I want to help make the place a better place, by empowering people around the world, to create their own businesses.
And because empowring and educating women will make the world a better place for all of us.
lender.occupational_info:
I manage interactive communications for Safe Kids Worldwide and Safe Kids USA.
Safe Kids USA is a member of Safe Kids Worldwide, a global network of organizations whose mission is to prevent accidental childhood injury, a leading killer of children 14 and under.
More than 450 coalitions in 16 countries bring together health and safety experts, educators, corporations, foundations, governments and volunteers to educate and protect families.

lender.name: Che
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea!

lender.name: Joanna
lender.occupation: Stay at home mom, former teacher

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I gain satisfaction in helping people pursue what they want and I always believe that everyone should be given the opportunity for a better lifestyle.
lender.occupational_info: Currently, I am a University Student. It's hard work, but I can't complain.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I Love helping people - and I know what it is like when you are starting out and have little money.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the computer and from home. I am an entrepreneur and self-taught. I like to help others who are starting out or struggling to get their business going.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I have lived and worked in developing countries for over a decade now and personally know many people like those requesting loans from Kiva. They are hardworking and just want the best for their families.

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: This helps people live a better life. It makes people's dreams come true.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I do it for Him.
lender.occupational_info: I work to build and keep Internet websites running

lender.name: jessica
lender.loan_because: it feels good
lender.occupational_info: i help people change

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: The more you give to the world, the more the world gives back to you.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: to help improve peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: invest in several australian businesses.

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: I would waste even more of my money on books otherwise.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the hub through which all radiological studies must pass. Once an X-ray/CT Scan/MRI has been done, it is archived through our system, sent for interpretation, and then routed to the appropriate location (patient pick-up, doctor's office, operating room, or emergency) -- my job is to facilitate this process.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I am so very humble and grateful for all we have in this country.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that as individuals we can partner to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Mariam
lender.loan_because: to qualified to be chosen for a cerfificate in order to increase company financial. At the moment, we are sub contract to the main contractor in malaysia. Our works to supply, install, grinding and polishing marble, parquet and timber flooring.

lender.name: VVD Wageningen
lender.loan_because: We are the local division of the Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD) in the municipality of Wageningen, The Netherlands, known for its famous agricultural university. Lots of international students from all over the world travel to our town to study here. Therefore we feel also responsible to provide equal opportunities in developing countries. Providing microcredits can be a good solution to do so. For every new member our party gets we save $25 for this purpose via Kiva.
lender.occupational_info:
The Volkspartij voor Vrijheid en Democratie (Party for Freedom and Democracy, VVD) is a political party founded on the liberal philosophy. Its aim is to further the free intellectual and social development of each individual, without making distinctions according to religious or ideological conviction, nationality, sex, race, colour of skin or language. Central to its beliefs is freedom of choice for everyone. With approximately 18% of the voters, the VVD is the third largest political party in the Netherlands.
The VVD believes that the government’s role is important, although not central, and it is not a goal in itself. In other words, the VVD wants everyone to have equal opportunities for development but, at the same time, it believes that those who earn more through hard work and those who develop their talents or take more responsibility upon themselves, should be better rewarded.
The VVD believes that the government’s role is important, although not central, and it is not a goal in itself. In other words, the VVD wants everyone to have equal opportunities for development but, at the same time, it believes that those who earn more through hard work and those who develop their talents or take more responsibility upon themselves, should be better rewarded.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I've found a way to give back to the countries I visit.

lender.name: Christopher + Kristina
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help others and give back to the world in whatever way we can.
lender.occupational_info: We like to help out people.

lender.name: Scott & Nani
lender.loan_because: We want others to achieve their dreams

lender.name: Gwyneth
lender.loan_because: I want to make things better and admire those who also want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage and improve administrative processes so that key staff can get on with running the core businesses. In my spare time, I help run South Lantau Buffaloes Mini Rugby Club so that kids in our rural part of Hong Kong develop sports, social and community skills but, most of all, have fun.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do...
lender.occupational_info:
Entrepreneur sifting through the same decisions as you do every day. Best Of Wishes!
Good Luck To You.!

lender.name: Nirmala
lender.loan_because: i believe that we are put on this earth to help our fellow human beings.
lender.occupational_info: i teach literature, which helps me to have a better understanding about human nature. i have included a picture of my cat, her name is Kelly, she makes my life worth living.

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: i dream to have my own business ,since my family depends on me i can`t save a large amount for a capital to start an international store .
lender.occupational_info: A hard one but i learn to love this work because from my earnings i can send money for my family and help my nephews and neices to go to school and provide their needs.

lender.name: Miyo
lender.loan_because: I can do it with little amount of money which will be meaningful, and have potential to change people's , families' life + future.

lender.name: paula
lender.loan_because: My heart responds to the hopes of these entrepreneurs to improve their lives. I respect their efforts, wishing them sucess. I also stand in gratitude remembering those who have helped me.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I want to help...as simple as that
lender.occupational_info:
We are an Open Source company that provides the best IT solutions and Support at a reduced price, we dont compromise Service excellence.
We use open source products to lower a company IT overheads

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: It seems like such a little thing to do. I'm sure it will mean a lot to someone who is struggling to improve their situation. I wish them well and I'm proud to be able to give them a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired.

lender.name: Nicolas R.
lender.loan_because: bridging funds to our ongoing government school furniture contract
lender.occupational_info: our works are too capital and labor intensive

lender.name: Shaun
lender.loan_because: this is a refreshing concept and an exciting way to empower others to do well for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: i design and develop web based applications

lender.name: Frederic
lender.loan_because: small drops of rain build big rivers.
lender.occupational_info: I am doing Revenue Management for an Airline.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: God's heart is for the oppressed, the fatherless and the widow. We need to defend the defenseless and lift up the poor!

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: Empower others to help themselves and build a brighter future.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: My boss is an amazing person that introduced me to the gift of Kiva Lending.

lender.name: Aline
lender.loan_because: I need a loan to build a consulting office on the outskirts of my town to attend the poor population that suffers from big city life and has no money to pay for psychological treatment. Really thanks!
lender.occupational_info: I am a psychologist who enjoys working with people from the periphery, and help them cope with the problems of urban life. always been voluntary and participating in social projects, I believe in the commitment we have with society and with disadvantaged people.

lender.name: George Kivaria (Kiva).
lender.loan_because: I can help others and change their way of life.
lender.occupational_info: Self employed, private consultant running a small IT Outsourcing company that I own.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: someone helped me get started in business and I appreciated their encouragement to try something new.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people in a business that moves boxes from one place to another...this industry is called "courier" and helps companies gets their products to their customers who sell these products to people who need them.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me in order to be a blessing to others! My resources belong to God and I want to be a faithful steward of what He has entrusted to me.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: We need to give everyone the opportunity to create a prosperous life for their families. Instead of a handout - this gives me the opportunity for a hand up, giving responsibility and accomplishment.
lender.occupational_info: I work in technology for a large bank managing operations, strategy, finance and information security.

lender.name: vincent
lender.loan_because: I like to help others
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Registered Nurse, in the Military

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want the world to be a better place!!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: To make a difference.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: It will help fuel positive change
lender.occupational_info: college admission officer

lender.name: Hugo
lender.loan_because: Visa romanisering Likes to develop people and businesses. Really hope that I can help you succeed with your projects and your life,
lender.occupational_info: Director Business Development and Marketing of Aktiva Fonder i Sverige AB

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I think KIVA is a great idea.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: it increases the money multiplier...and its a good casuse too :)
lender.occupational_info: PhD student in Finance

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do! Any amount will help.
lender.occupational_info: I am in sales, involves alot of travel and I meet alot of people daily.

lender.name: WGC EGR
lender.loan_because: Our World Geography and Culture class here at East Grand Rapids High School has seen the possibilities microfinancing can provide.
lender.occupational_info: We learn and grow as individuals in a global community, attempting to better understand and appreciate the world around us

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Romans 8:28
lender.occupational_info: I teach mentally challenged elementary school students.

lender.name: fabrizio
lender.loan_because: to contribute to a better world

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I can and should
lender.occupational_info: I work on sustainable, non-food biofuel research and development.

lender.name: Canadian Finance Guy
lender.occupational_info: http://randomtravelphoto.blogspot.com/

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: There are people out there who truley deserve that chance that only we can give.
lender.occupational_info: I trouble shoot and repair electrical and refrigeration problems that happen with the farmers cellars and warehouses in my surrounding area. Which is south eastern Idaho united states.

lender.name: Harold
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of microfinance and its effects on developing nations. I am doing my small share for social and economic development.
lender.occupational_info: Commercial activities and responsibilities for charity lotteries in a broad commercial field. Our lottery raises funds for charities. As of december 2010 we raise 1.25 million every day thanks to the players of our lotteries.

lender.name: Patrise
lender.loan_because: because it is the right thing to do and teach in OUR world!

lender.name: Kristin & Keenan
lender.loan_because: Paying it forward is the very best way for me to express my gratitude for those who have helped me recover from my recent accident and injuries. It's also a fantastic way to teach children the importance of sharing, and helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Kristin: I help companies and governments build SECURE computer systems, and learn how to safely and securely protect their assets - including their data, buildings, and PEOPLE. Keenan: I make people smile and laugh pretty much all day and night!

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: When I came to the U.S. I had dreams and plans and a strong desire to succeed. One of the biggest obstacles was to obtain the funding to accomplish my goals. Now that I have the resources I would like to help as many people as possible to obtain their goals and at the same time they can improve their lives and the economy of the people in their community.
lender.occupational_info: I trained as a Chemists and posterior I became a Physician. As a Chemists I found the pleasure to discover and research deep in the secrets of nature. As a Physician I learned the pleasure, happiness and hope I can bring to other people's lives, and at the same time feel a whole and fulfilled life.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I feel the need to support small businesses , so they can achieve a better life !!
lender.occupational_info: i work in telecoms and sell data services to the global carriers

lender.name: Mark Parsons
lender.loan_because: we all need to help each other

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: charity is important and it begins with you.
lender.occupational_info: I test software for a living to make sure that it works correctly.

lender.name: Dan & Desiree
lender.loan_because: We've received help in our lives and now have an opportunity to assist others
lender.occupational_info: We are retired Administrators that worked for the City of Long Beach

lender.name: Bernadette
lender.loan_because: I know for a fact that a lot of poor families needs security and financial help. And I want to help these families especially those who have children.
lender.occupational_info: I work at the Postal Office. We sort, case and deliver mail.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: We are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to make their businesses run more efficiently.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: It's a way I can provide direct help to someone who needs help in a distant place.
lender.occupational_info: I do the ordinary work of a Catholic Priest. I celebrate (pray) the Mass with people, visit sick and shut-in people, prepare people to get married, preside over funerals, and manage a parish which also has a school with 180 students.

lender.name: Laurence
lender.loan_because: Other people deserve the opportunities I receive naturally.
lender.occupational_info: Implement computer systems, train staff in its operations and define procedures for accounting & auditing.

lender.name: Rachel H
lender.loan_because: We all need help sometimes, especially if we are going to use the help to become self-sufficient or better than we were before...not as a method or practice of continuously asking for help. Break the cycle - Pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: Making a positive difference in how or what we are doing.

lender.name: Jahanara and Wavy
lender.loan_because: We loan because we can.
lender.occupational_info: We work at a summer camp for children, where they can learn to do circus arts like juggling, trapeze and walk on stilts.

lender.name: MazieroCaldasFamily
lender.loan_because: Helping others realize their dreams is everything we can expect. We are particularly focused in helping people produce more food anywhere, since I understand their problems and share their happiness when their iniciatives succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We are organic fruit producers in Brasil

lender.name: Eddie
lender.loan_because: My heart feels warmer and lighter when I try to help someone else. I really like the way Kiva does this.
lender.occupational_info: I bend hot glass to form letters which are used in signs for other small businesses.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying as an engineer so that I can make clean energy that doesn't hurt the environment and will let our children prosper.

lender.name: Pablo
lender.occupational_info: Work with the distribution of products related to Bem-Estar that already are has 28 years in the market and more than possesss 40 million satisfied customers in 65 countries where the company is present.

lender.name: Edmund
lender.occupational_info: My company helps to keep homes and business organized, free of clutter, and efficient.

lender.name: David Floyd Houston
lender.loan_because: I was born and partially raised in a small Indiana (USA) town known for its poverty and lack of opportunity. Having escaped that poverty and lack of opportunity, I want all people on Earth to have the opportunity to own their own business, improve the quality of their life, and pursue their dreams. And each time I help finance a small business around the world, I am hopefully creating one less terrorist and one less illegal immigrant to the USA, by creating opportunity and goodwill where the people already live.
lender.occupational_info: I was President & CEO of a company that provided legal services to lawyers and judges in the USA. I retired in 2004 in Louisville, Kentucky, USA. Our family roots trace back to the village of Houston, Scotland.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: Everyone has the ability to be successful, sometimes we need a little boost to get there!

lender.name: Fred & Barb
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do! Individually we may not be able to move a mountain but together, if we each move a wheel barrel of earth, the mountain will get moved.
lender.occupational_info: Working to reduce the carbon footprint of business by making distributed renewable wind energy available as a viable economic alternative to fossil fuels.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: God is good!
lender.occupational_info: I run a library for students in Kindergarten through 8th Grade.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I care about my fellow Human Beings.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a positive difference in a person's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the healthcare industry.

lender.name: monal
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in any way I can.

lender.name: monica
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference in my life. Found in these few words are the essential principles of the Art of Giving: Respect, Appreciation, Gratitude and Value. Move sequentially, from one to the other.
lender.occupational_info: I handle and make financial choices every day.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good thing to let money flow around. If I have a little bit more than I need at the moment, than this money can work for someone else who has less at that time.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a musician (overtone singing, framedrums, string instruments...) and am also working with alternative healing methodes. I also like to combine this two fields. My new project is called "silence within music": www.silencewithinmusic.com
Other projects: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f3peZkdJblw http://www.metamorphische-methode.de http://obertongesang.stimmigleben.de http://www.kennenlernangebot.de http://pilates.stimmigleben.de http://shop.stimmigleben.de http://www.christianhack.net http://www.musikmassage.de http://www.haq.de

lender.name: Neil Hong
lender.loan_because: I'm always willing to lend a helping hand to those who need it.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by people improving their lives.

lender.name: Rodrigo
lender.loan_because: I work with microcredit in Brazil and I know it works. So I'd like to help somebody overseas too.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: of sisterhood and brotherhood
lender.occupational_info: I learn, I teach, I paint, I dance in spirit. In the past I have been a development worker in India, a manager, a lecturer, a planner, a consultant.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: This is a great program. Thanks!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying to be a registered nurse.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Retired phone company executive. Active community volunteer.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I love to!
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and try to learn as much as i can to become a better person

lender.name: LAWRENCE
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior commercial credit analyst for a private bank. I review business financials and meet with business owners to determine whether or not they are a lendable entity.

lender.name: Twinky
lender.loan_because: I have been successful in my life due to the help of others so to honor their faith in me, I want to do my part to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I handle the finances for a small biotech company.

lender.name: catherine
lender.loan_because: ITS THE RIGHTEOUS THINK TO DO
lender.occupational_info: I'M A PCA. A PERSONAL CAREGIVER. I GIVE CARE TO THE ELDERLY IN THEIR HOMES INSTEAD OF A FACILITY.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: It reaffirms that every little bit counts and we should all do what we can to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I help women in the US start their own children's book businesses.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.occupational_info: I provide after-school programs for second-generation immigrant kids

lender.name: George
lender.whereabouts: Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro

lender.name: NTB
lender.loan_because: I think they really need it.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it's a simple way to help industrious entrepreneurs to build a viable business and life!
lender.occupational_info: I help college students plan careers and secure employment.

lender.name: robin
lender.loan_because: we all need to affect change and this ismy way.
lender.occupational_info: event management

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I believe it important to help others to help themselves.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and I want to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: I write software that protects computers.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good way to give responsible people a break without charing them a fortune for the investment. I figure it's a good way to help people to help themselves and eventually help others in a similar position.
lender.occupational_info: I build and maintain computer systems.

lender.name: margaret
lender.loan_because: it will help improve the lives of people less fortunate than me, not only financially, but it will be a boost to their self esteem.

lender.name: Brandi
lender.loan_because: I hope someone would help me if I were in need...

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because:
I believe that with a little assistance anyone can further their state of existence. I also believe that it is my responsibility to assist those who are interested in self improvement. It is also my Biblical duty to assist those in need. A combination of all of these is the reason that I am a supporter of Kiva.
I look forward to the wonderful things that are in store for Kiva, its partners and this Heartland team.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I help cook food to serve to customers

lender.name: Marion & Floyd
lender.loan_because: We want to share our love & abundance
lender.occupational_info: Salesperson/Entrepreneur

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: God loves the poor and marginalized and asks us to do the same.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: I am trying to save money to launch a new website. Loaning to others enables me to put my money to work rather than holding it somewhere that tempts me to spend it. Additionally, I have myself spent years on the edge of poverty, have lost my home twice. I know what it feels like to be there.
lender.occupational_info: I am a web designer with several years of experience designing for myself. I am beginning to look for clients for basic design and updating existing websites for optimum usability. I do not yet have a professional website to direct viewers to.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I hope!
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have experienced trauma.

lender.name: Loretta
lender.loan_because: I have received an abundance of blessings throughout my life and continue to receive them and I want to share my blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: Human research protections

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I have hopes that everyone can be happy.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children and families who are experiencing mental illness, relationship problems, or behavioral problems. Sometimes I prescribe medication to the patients if if will help.

lender.name: Kory
lender.loan_because: I like to help people, but I don't feel that serving food at the soup kitchen helps anyone. I know that the same people are just going to be back tomorrow, and the next day, and the next - expecting food for free and doing nothing to help themselves get out of their rut. With Kiva I feel that I'm giving industrious people a well earned and essential opportunity to thrive and build the economy in their own communities.

lender.name: Darren & Augusta
lender.loan_because: as a Christian my husband and I feel called to be the hands and feet of Christ. We feel blessed so we want to be a blessing to others. And we loan because it is one of the many simple and easy things people can do to be part of the solution to help others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I dispense medicine to the people who are sick or who needs medication in order to stay healthy. I help educate them how to take care of their medical needs.

lender.name: katie
lender.loan_because: "the world owes me nothing, and we owe each other the world."

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: it doesn't take much to make a tremendous difference to someone's life.

lender.name: Vito
lender.loan_because: During a vacation to the Dominican Republic I took a tour of villages away from the vacation spots and met wonderful hard working people struggling to have a good life. It opened my eyes to how privileged I am and gave me a strong desire to help others.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to be in my position in a first world country.

lender.name: raleigh
lender.occupational_info: I manage all daily operations of a website providing information to those interested in outdoor activities such as hiking, climbing, and paddling; I also manage all online sales for the same outdoor and travel outfitter.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Helping others in need gives me the most satisfaction in emotionally and spiritually.
lender.occupational_info: I create Automation scripts for testing Web pages and applications.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: People need capitol to get ahead, to improve their health, education and general living conditions. As they do so they bring their family, neighbors and country up with them.
lender.occupational_info: Respond to medical emergencies or injuries on the street, in public places, in people's homes or their place of business. Evaluate and treat people including providing IVs, medications and other medical care. Provide emotional care and support to patients and there family and friends when critically ill, dead or dying.

lender.name: Laurel & Milton
lender.loan_because: It is good to help other people succeed. We both have been helped by others and want to pass on the goodness that has come to us.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because:
I know how it feels to have hopes and dreams and ambition that might have been extinguished without a helping hand.
A $25.00 Pizza is gone in 30 minutes.....
lender.occupational_info: I am an Internet Sales Manager at a Lexus Dealership in Georgia.

lender.name: Col
lender.loan_because: I believe that success is often than not, a combination of hard work, determination, having a dream and also a little bit of luck..

lender.name: Cheng
lender.loan_because: 1. someone has forgiven the humongous debt that i owe. 2. I don't have $25,000; i don't have $2,500; I don't have $250, but i have $25! (graciously given by my friend, who introduced me to kiva!)
lender.occupational_info: hm... i learn things that I'm not good at (yet) and hope that I'll be better at it. :p

lender.name: Pieter
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with much, and wish to help others with lesser opportunities
lender.occupational_info: I oversee a cement manufacturing plant in the remote town of Dwaalboom, looking after all aspects of such an operation including production, maintenance, human resources, logistics.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I received Kiva credit from my grandmother for christmas. It turns out that it was a very cool gift to receive. :)

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: it is the least I can do
lender.occupational_info: Aviation

lender.name: Riley K.
lender.loan_because: i want to help others in need!!

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: A helping hand is always a good thing.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I want to improve the chance of success for small business owners.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying how people deal with natural hazards, and ways that disaster mitigation and relief can be improved and made more equitable.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: $25 making a difference in anyone's life, that's a remarkable task. It makes me feel like I can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mom right now (finally graduated from college though). My mom has breast cancer, so I'm helping her to treatment also.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I enjoy participating with those who are willing to work to improve their lifestyle and community.
lender.occupational_info: Wholesaler of equipment for the building of water features-water gardens, koi ponds, waterfalls, Architectural fountains

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Profit is for punks
lender.occupational_info: Prosperity is for everyone regardless of age, race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or geography.

lender.name: Laurie-Ann
lender.loan_because: It's a very small sacrifice for me and huge advantage for someone else!!
lender.occupational_info: Jail guard

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: Hard to find a better investment than helping change lives.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because:
By luck of birth I live a fortunate existence and believe that Karma demands I give back in as many opportunities as possible.
In this abundant life I seek to remember and aspire to adhere to the tenet: Live simply so that others may simply live.
lender.occupational_info:
I perform; I teach kindergarten; I teach college; I volunteer.
My workday is joyfully spent in the company of my favorite age group: kinderkids (5-6 year olds.) I genuinely believe I can teach deep concepts regarding compassion and true global citizenship via the wisdom of Kiva.
I choose to use Kiva to teach my kinderkids about the world and they are equal partners in making my donation decisions this year.
Thank you Kiva for inspiring some of my most dynamic lessons as we weave math (tallying our votes) to discussions about gender equity (should we support a man or woman this month?) to finding our reading sight words in the printed text of lender's stories.
My kids, my families, my principal and I are impressed by the knowledge imbedded within these lessons.
THANK YOU KIVA for all you do... Kevin G. Gallagher

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I am interested in empowering people to change their lives
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist who brings insight,joy and transformation to those who view or purchase my artwork

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: I know that every little bit counts.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small company that specializes in ICF (Insulated Concrete Form) building. My company is rated as one of the top builders in our field.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: If not me, who?

lender.name: Alissa
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves. Everyone should be able to reach for their goals.

lender.name: Cale
lender.loan_because: It's helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I go to high school.

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I like to know that the money I give to someone reaches them, and I hope, is able to help them expand their business and their lives.

lender.name: Dave & Erin
lender.loan_because: We want to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Erin is a teacher. Dave is a communicator.

lender.name: Bonny
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I inspect construction sites for water quality protective measures enforceable by law. I am also a musician.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Amrit
lender.loan_because: I want to help ... its my nature.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for all that is related in a skilled nursing facility that takes care of the elderly population of our community.

lender.name: Cenk
lender.loan_because: Microloans make the right impact for enterprising citizens of the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I try to figure out how white blood cells work.

lender.name: Scott & Erin
lender.loan_because: We live a wonderful life by the chance of location and the opportunities we've had. We are able to eat the foods we want and to go and experience life via the arts, museums, books, incredible natural settings, etc., and would like to help others to be able to rise up from the most basic levels of survival and subsistence, as in the end we are all living here together.
lender.occupational_info: We run our family business, which is a 60 year old feed mill and retail store. We do everything from supplying farmers with their animal feed needs to supplying others with their pet animals' feed and supplies.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: It just makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired (professionally) and now enjoy making shaker style furnishings and clocks. I enjoy using my bicycle for pleasure rides and as a means of transport.

lender.name: Little Green Bags
lender.occupation: Founder of Little Green Bags™ Limited
lender.loan_because:
Reaching out with love and empowering one another to be greater than we know ourselves to be creates an entire new world of possibility. A possibility to live a life that is extraordinary beyond measure simply because we say so.
"Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be? You are a child of God. Your playing small does not serve the world. There is nothing enlightened about shrinking so that other people won't feel insecure around you. We are all meant to shine, as children do. We were born to make manifest the glory of God that is within us. It's not just in some of us; it's in everyone. And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same. As we are liberated from our own fear, our presence automatically liberates others." ~Marianne Williamson
lender.occupational_info: I believe in sharing our vision, giving back to the community, and replenishing the Earths natural resources. As an advocate for and producer of innovative Earth-friendly textile products, Ive created a company that proudly promotes the responsible use of resources that protect and enhance the environment. We offer an opportunity and a voice to those who are economically disempowered and impoverished. ~Michelle Nadon, Founder

lender.name: Kayla
lender.loan_because: It helps others who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a waitress part time and go to college full time for dental hygiene.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: It's not charity. It's a loan. Loans command responsibility. We all gain when each of us is given a chance to enhance our own lives - and then encourage others to grow. Hopefully, an unending circle.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help sometimes.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: This was a gift and I am passing it on.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university and help manage the financial policies.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I work at a small business and know how helpful loans can be.
lender.occupational_info: I make computers do useful things.

lender.name: Kati & Tony
lender.loan_because: We like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Tony is a CAD/CAM operator who designs prefabricated stairways while I'm a homemaker.

lender.name: June
lender.loan_because: The good Lord has blessed me with the ability to help others in need.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: You should always do for others!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: we're all connected
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to help them accomplish goals

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: i loan because giving to most charities only provides temporary relief to a need. i want to see God's world changed by compassion, but there are very few ways to bring about permanent change and kiva is one of them.
lender.occupational_info: i'm only a student right now.

lender.name: Dylan
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I go to a government building to be taught the ideas the government wants me to know.

lender.name: catherine
lender.loan_because: I believe in changing lives with a small gesture..I believe in empowering people by believing in them..allowing them the opportunity to create a better life for themselves, thus for their family, community, nation...and so on...
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of a women's shelter. A place where we offer food, shelter, clothing for the homeless women or women living in poverty. Part of my role is to ensure that we receive enough funding to continue our important work within the community and continue helping the women in need.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I grew up in Africa and know how a little can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an animal hospital and assist the veterinarian in caring for patients.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be a blessing.

lender.name: Bacall, Bella
lender.loan_because: everyone needs equal oppurtunity in recieving something they trully need.
lender.occupational_info: I throw events that are based upon electronic music and fashion.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I believe we should all give something back to those that could use the hand up.
lender.occupational_info: specialized courier services.

lender.name: The VanDenBerghes
lender.occupation: JaNel, Paul, Jackson, Elise, Aimee, Leo
lender.loan_because: Jackson (7) says that we loan because we want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: JaNel stays home to teach Jackson (7), Elise (4), Aimee (3), and Leo (4 months). Paul is an editor for a magazine. We love learning about people all over the world.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping others who are are in need of financial help to get them on the road of prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell just about anything. Buying on auctions, private ads and then after refurbishing or cleaning the item, I resell to the end user.

lender.name: Or and Ro
lender.loan_because: We got the help when we needed it - it's time for us to help other in need

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I really like helping people

lender.name: yolanda
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to help another individual become successful in their endeavor to be self-employed. We are all part of the human race and, if you can, it is important to help one another reach personal goals no matter where you live in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a property that will fit their needs and price range that they can purchase as a place to call 'home', or to own as an investment.

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are helping themselves and their families. We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info:
I take care of my kids and my dog, hug my girlfriend, and sometimes work on computers.
My profile pic is my mom at the age of 12 or 13. Happy Mothers Day!

lender.name: Raychel
lender.loan_because: I can help other people right from my own home. How cool is that?

lender.name: Zack
lender.loan_because: It has an impact.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Pittsburgh and am also joining the Peace Corps (leaving for Africa in July).

lender.name: Bob and Regina
lender.loan_because: All of the world's people deserve the opportunity to benefit from their hard work and in turn, share that success with others. To give is a gift and I am privileged to be able to share.
